name: Master Brain
overview: Master Brain is turn-based concentration card game, published in the Crash Magazine. The game can be played as a one or two player game. A set of card is placed face down and the players turn over two at a time, they have to find a matching pair. If a match is found those card are removed and the player has another go. If two cards are unsuccessfully matched the cards are placed face down once again and the next player goes. The game has three different skill levels.
